snippet: The Turkish leader may be a bitter disappointment to Mr. Obama, but he is still better than other options in the chaotic landscape of the Middle East....
abstract: Pres Obama's continuing support of Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan despite latter's increasing authoritarianism and state of emergency Erdogan declared as part of crackdown in wake of failed coup attempt underscores degree to which Turkey remains crucial ally in region.
lead_paragraph: The Turkish leader may be a bitter disappointment to Mr. Obama, but he is still better than other options in the chaotic landscape of the Middle East.

headline.main: Obama’s Support of Erdogan Is a Stark Reminder of Turkey’s Value to U.S.
headline.print_headline: Obama’s Support of Erdogan Is Stark Reminder of Turkey’s Value to U.S.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
